b:if.h3: A renaissance of information and goodwill resulting from technology in the hands of the poor.

div.p: There are exciting things going on at Social Range. Want to join in? Fork our projects, challenge us to do better on twitter, or read and comment on something we've said:

Patatat allows you to develop mobile mailing lists easily. Throughout the world Short Message Service (SMS) and texting takes the place of email and often voice communications. Patatat provides a central location for you to experiment with new ideas, aggregate your data from multiple sites, and generate reports on your findings.

HappyPill helps you remember to take your medication. You tell us when you are supposed to take it. Then when that time rolls around you call us and let us know you did it (we call this flashing). If you forget to call us, we'll send a text message to remind you. Then you can call us. You'll feel better, we'll feel better.

We're Social Range. We are working to make the world a healthier place and for us the world is a lot bigger than our own backyard. We are working with governments and organizations around the world to improve HIV and Tuberculosis adherence and followup. To help people communicate better. Find out how you can take part.
